title: FLOAT PKM Setup
description: A starter kit for setting up a Personal Knowledge Management (PKM) system using the FLOAT methodology.

fullDescription.content: FLOAT PKM Setup is a starter kit for setting up a Personal Knowledge Management (PKM) system using the FLOAT methodology. It helps users quickly establish a framework for capturing, organizing, and connecting information in a thoughtful, structured way.

FLOAT (Floating Linked Ontological Associative Thinking) is a methodology for organizing knowledge and thoughts. It's designed to create a more fluid, interconnected system for managing information compared to traditional hierarchical systems.
The FLOAT system is built around several key concepts:

items.title: Thought Spaces
items.content: Dedicated areas for different types of thinking (Main Consciousness, Creative Ideation, Critical Analysis)

items.title: Time Echoes
items.content: Temporal organization of thoughts (Today, Yesterday, Last Week)

items.title: Thought Maps
items.content: Visual representations of connected ideas and concepts

items.title: AI Analysis
items.content: Intelligent assistance for discovering patterns and insights in your thoughts
